name: @crestron/ch5-shell-utilities-cli
description: CH5 Shell Utilities CLI for command scripts
author: Crestron

scripts.publish:local: npm run build && npm unlink && npm link
scripts.test:mocha: npm run clean && npm run build:test && nyc mocha --config=.mocharc.json
scripts.create: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.setup:local: npm install && npm link @crestron/ch5-shell-utilities-cli && npm run build && npm link
scripts.my:build:pack:reload: rm -rf shell-template && npm uninstall -g '@crestron/ch5-shell-utilities-cli' && npm cache clean --force && npm run my:build:pack
scripts.my:build:pack: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.dev.json && node build dev && npm pack && npm install -g '/Users/rdabbir/Desktop/My/Work/Projects/CH5/CH5ShellUtilitiesCli/crestron-ch5-shell-utilities-cli-2.4.1.tgz'
scripts.my:create:project:test: cd build && rm -rf output && mkdir output && cd output && ch5-shell-cli create:project --verbose
scripts.my:create:project:test:repeat: cd build && cd output && ch5-shell-cli create:project --verbose
scripts.my:create:project:test1: cd build && rm -rf output && mkdir output && cd output && ch5-shell-cli create:project --config '/Users/rdabbir/Desktop/configold.json' --projectName 'shell-template' --verbose
scripts.my:update:project:test: cd build && cd output && cd 'shell-template' && ch5-shell-cli update:project  --verbose
scripts.my:update:project:test1: cd build && cd output && cd 'shell-template' && ch5-shell-cli update:project --config '/Users/rdabbir/Desktop/configold.json' --projectName 'shell-template' --verbose
